1.title: New agents
1.body: Another instance of Dialect 21 leaves several stranded friendlies for potential activation. Follow-up required.

2.title: Follow-up Required
2.body: As suggested in my prior message, your attendance is required. A report is due to Virgo.

3.title: Severance
3.body: You access is restricted. Your retirement plan is processing. Consider this a warning.

1.title: Welcome
1.body: Welcome to the system, Agent Jacko. Please wait for activation orders.
